name: Just Say It!!
description:
Created for NaNoRenO 2018

Playtime: about 5 minutes

The Confession Crew has only one mission: to help people say the things they want to say! In this short interactive game, help the Kohai confess to her Senpai by clicking on the signs and making a (hopefully) clear confession!

Version 1.0: the initial release! Currently the only thing missing is sound or music, but the basic game should be playable.
